subject: Track and Field
Records and Achievements
Running
lead_paragraph: Mary Cain broke her own world junior indoor record in the 1,000 meters, winning the New Balance Indoor Grand Prix in 2 minutes 35.80 seconds in Boston.
snippet: Mary Cain broke her own world junior indoor record in the 1,000 meters, winning the New Balance Indoor Grand Prix in 2 minutes 35.80 seconds in Boston.
